content.description: A sound source emits sound of a single frequency in all directions. At the instant shown in the figure, observers <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"> <mtext>A</mtext> </math>, <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi> </math> are at the locations shown and are moving toward the sound source with the speeds indicated.
content.question: Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="f sub A" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>f</mi> <mtext>A</mtext> </msub> </math>, <math alttext="f sub B" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>, and <math alttext="f sub C" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></math>, the frequencies of sound observed by observers <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, f sub A equals f sub B, close parenthesis, is greater than f sub C" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="f sub C is greater than, open parenthesis, f sub A equals f sub B, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, f sub A equals f sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than f sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f sub B is greater than, open parenthesis, f sub A equals f sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f sub B is greater than, open parenthesis, f sub A equals f sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
